verses.name: Mark 14:20
verses.text: And he answered and said unto them, It is one of the twelve, that dippeth with me in the dish.

verses.name: Mark 14:21
verses.text: The Son of man indeed goeth, as it is written of him: but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed! good were it for that man if he had never been born.

verses.name: Mark 14:22
verses.text: And as they did eat, Jesus took bread, and blessed, and brake it, and gave to them, and said, Take, eat: this is my body.
